alert.note: Alert for Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 9:25AM CST until January 12 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN WALKER AND SOUTHEASTERN WINSTON COUNTIES... At 925 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smith Lake to near Smith Dam to near Jasper, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Arley, Sipsey, Curry, Smith Dam, Nesmith, Smith Lake, Helicon, Falls City, Lynns Park, Mill Branch, Maple Branch, Little Dismal Creek, Powellville, Battle Branch, Hidden Cove Campground, Panther Branch, Wilson Bend, Devils Branch and Duncan Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central and northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
